title: Srikanth
writer: K K Binojee, Sumit Purohit, Jagdeep Sidhu
short_cast: Rajkummar Rao, Jyothika, Alaya F, Sharad Kelkar, Arnav Abdagiri, Srinivas Beesetty, Anusha Nuthula, Sridhar Murthy
cast: Rajkummar Rao, Jyothika, Alaya F, Sharad Kelkar, Arnav Abdagiri, Srinivas Beesetty, Anusha Nuthula, Sridhar Murthy
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Drama Movies, Movies Based on Real Life, Social Issue Dramas
m_desc: Suitable for children 7 and above and under parental guidance for persons under age of 7
desc: A visually-impaired man overcomes extreme obstacles in education and business in this biopic chronicling the life of industrialist Srikanth Bolla.
